name: glassy-school-nexus
description: School management system monorepo with React frontend and .NET Core backend

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npm run dev 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend dev command not configured'
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm run build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend build command not configured'
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: npm run test --workspace=frontend 2>/dev/null || echo 'Frontend tests not configured'
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend tests not configured'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend lint not configured'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf bin obj node_modules

author: Petar Stojkovski
